    Getting started with penalizedLMM

    An updated function for processing PLINK files

    process_plink_2.Rd

    An updated function for processing PLINK files

    Usage

    process_plink_2(
  data_dir,
  prefix,
  rds = FALSE,
  impute = "simple",
  quiet = FALSE,
  ...
)

    Arguments

    data_dir

    The path to the bed/bim/fam data files

    prefix

    The prefix (as a character string) of the bed/fam data files

    rds

    Logical: does an rds file for these data files already exist in data_dir? Defaults to FALSE

    impute

    Character string indicating type of imputation to use. "simple" will use bigsnpr::snp_fastImputeSimple, and "xgboost" will use bigsnpr::snp_fastImpute. Defaults to "simple." Note: 'impute' argument is still under construction. Only "simple" method is available at this time.

    quiet

    Logical: should messages be printed to the console? Defaults to TRUE

    ...

    Other arguments to bigsnpr::snp_fastImpute or bigsnpr::snp_fastImputeSimple (depending on choice of impute)

    Examples

    
if (FALSE) {
cad_mid <- process_plink_2(data_dir = plink_example(path = "cad_mid.bed", parent = T), prefix = "cad_mid", rds = T, impute = "simple", method = "mean0")
}
